{"id":1000982195,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1690036943,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"18 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1000982195/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Check if Array is Good","memory":"23.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    map<int,int>mp;\n    bool isGood(vector<int>& nums) {\n       \n        int n= nums.size();\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n          mp[nums[i]]++;}\n        for(int i=0;i<n-2;i++){\n            if(mp[i+1]!=1){return false;}\n        }\n        if(mp[n-1]!=2)return false;\n        \n        return true;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"check-if-array-is-good","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
